document.full_text: american wild card ryan sweeting completed his unlikely tournament run by capturing the u.s. clay court championship with a 6-4 7-6 victory over japan's kei nishikori on sunday.
document.title: american sweeting claims first atp tour title
lines_and_colors: american wild card ryan sweeting completed his unlikely tournament run by capturing the u.s. clay court championship with a 6-4 7-6 victory over japan's kei nishikori on sunday.
